content.heading: <blockquote> Tag
paragraphs: The <blockquote> tag specifies a section quoted from another source.

Example:
For 50 years, WWF has been protecting the future of nature. The world's leading conservation organization, WWF works in 100 countries and is supported by 1.2 million members in the United States and close to 5 million globally.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: Use CSS to remove indentation if needed (e.g., margin-left: 0;).

rows: Specifies the source of the quotation
